Changelog ​

All notable changes to PAW Blockchain documentation.

[1.0.0] - 2025-01-15 ​

Added ​

  • Complete documentation portal with VitePress
  • User guides (Getting Started, Wallets, DEX, Staking, Governance)
  • Developer guides (Quick Start, JavaScript SDK, Python SDK, Go, Smart Contracts, Modules, API)
  • Validator guides (Setup, Operations, Security, Monitoring, Troubleshooting)
  • Reference documentation (Architecture, Tokenomics, Network Specs)
  • Comprehensive FAQ
  • Detailed Glossary
  • Full-text search functionality
  • Dark/light theme support
  • Responsive design
  • Video tutorial embeds
  • Edit on GitHub links
  • Social sharing support

Features ​

  • 20+ documentation pages
  • Multi-language support ready
  • Version selector
  • Interactive code examples
  • Real-time search
  • Mobile-optimized layout
